title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Innovative Learning Design Utilizing Ecological Psychology and Nonlinear Dynamics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can integrate the concepts of self-regulation and meta-stability from ecological psychology into instructional design.
Learners develop the ability to creatively manipulate task constraints (information, space, equipment) according to principles of nonlinear pedagogy.
Learners can design and evaluate simulation environments that induce adaptive behaviors in the meta-stable zone.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
